sections.title: Hell Knight (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Hell Knight class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Weapon and Armor Proficiency (Hell Knight)
sections.description: Hell Knights gain no proficiency with any weapon or armor upon taking the class.

sections.title: Aura of Law (Ex) (Hell Knight)
sections.description: A Hell Knight radiates a lawful aura detectable by detect law spells, with strength equal to a cleric of the same character level.

sections.title: Detect Chaos (Sp) (Hell Knight)
sections.description: Functions like a paladin's detect evil ability but allows the use of detect chaos instead.

sections.title: Order (Hell Knight)
sections.description: A Hell Knight must choose a specific Hell Knight order at 1st level, which determines available disciplines later.

sections.title: Smite Chaos (Su) (Hell Knight)
sections.description: Functions as a paladin's smite evil but targets chaotic creatures, with double effectiveness against chaotic outsiders, aberrations, and fey.

sections.title: Discern Lies (Sp) (Hell Knight)
sections.description: Allows the use of discern lies as a spell-like ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + Charisma modifier.

sections.title: Hell Knight Armor (Ex) (Hell Knight)
sections.description: Grants the right to wear Hell Knight plate without speed reduction and provides increasing armor check penalty reduction and max Dex bonus improvements.

sections.title: Disciplines (Hell Knight)
sections.description: Hell Knights gain access to special supernatural and spell-like abilities called disciplines, with usage per day equal to total disciplines known.

sections.title: Force of Will (Ex) (Hell Knight)
sections.description: Provides increasing Will save bonuses against spells with specific subschools or descriptors like charm, compulsion, fear, etc.

sections.title: Lawbringer (Ex) (Hell Knight)
sections.description: All of the Hell Knight's attacks are treated as lawful-aligned for the purpose of overcoming damage reduction.

sections.title: Infernal Armor (Su) (Hell Knight)
sections.description: While wearing Hell Knight armor, grants Charisma bonuses with lawful creatures, perfect darkvision, and energy resistances.

sections.title: Hell’s Knight (Su) (Hell Knight)
sections.description: Allows granting axiomatic, flaming burst, or unholy weapon properties to touched weapons and provides fire immunity while wearing Hell Knight plate.
